description: Stores document templates for system-generated documents

create_statement:
-- Table: c01.tbl_orderdetails

CREATE TABLE c01.tbl_orderdetails (
    id integer NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,    orderid integer NOT NULL REFERENCES c01.tbl_order(id),    customerid integer NOT NULL REFERENCES c01.tbl_order(customerid),    customerid integer NOT NULL REFERENCES c01.tbl_order(customerid),    serialnumber character varying(50),    inventoryitemid integer NOT NULL,    pricecodeid integer NOT NULL,    salerenttype sale_rent_type_enum NOT NULL,    serialid integer,    billableprice numeric(18,2) NOT NULL,    allowableprice numeric(18,2) NOT NULL,    taxable boolean NOT NULL,    flatrate boolean NOT NULL,    dosfrom date NOT NULL,    dosto date,    pickupdate date,    showspandates boolean NOT NULL,    orderedquantity double precision NOT NULL,    orderedunits character varying(50),    orderedwhen period_enum NOT NULL,    orderedconverter double precision NOT NULL,    billedquantity double precision NOT NULL,    billedunits character varying(50),    billedwhen period_enum NOT NULL,    billedconverter double precision NOT NULL,    deliveryquantity double precision NOT NULL,    deliveryunits character varying(50),    deliveryconverter double precision NOT NULL,    billingcode character varying(50),    modifier1 character varying(8) NOT NULL,    modifier2 character varying(8) NOT NULL,    modifier3 character varying(8) NOT NULL,    modifier4 character varying(8) NOT NULL,    dxpointer character varying(50),    billingmonth integer NOT NULL,    billitemon bill_item_enum NOT NULL,    authorizationnumber character varying(50),    authorizationtypeid integer,    reasonforpickup character varying(50),    sendcmn_rx_w_invoice boolean NOT NULL,    medicallyunnecessary boolean NOT NULL,    sale boolean NOT NULL,    specialcode character varying(50),    reviewcode character varying(50),    nextorderid integer REFERENCES c01.tbl_order(id),    reoccuringid integer,    cmnformid integer,    haocode character varying(10),    state order_state_enum NOT NULL,    billins1 boolean NOT NULL,    billins2 boolean NOT NULL,    billins3 boolean NOT NULL,    billins4 boolean NOT NULL,    enddate date,    mir text NOT NULL,    nextbillingdate date,    warehouseid integer NOT NULL,    acceptassignment boolean NOT NULL,    drugnotefield character varying(20),    drugcontrolnumber character varying(50),    nopayins1 boolean NOT NULL,    pointericd10 smallint NOT NULL,    dxpointer10 character varying(50),    \
text NOT NULL,    haodescription character varying(100),    userfield1 character varying(100) NOT NULL,    userfield2 character varying(100) NOT NULL,    authorizationexpirationdate date\n);\n

-- Table: c01.tbl_paymentplan_payments

CREATE TABLE c01.tbl_paymentplan_payments (
    id integer NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,    paymentplanid integer NOT NULL,    customerid integer NOT NULL,    \

integer NOT NULL,    duedate date NOT NULL,    dueamount numeric(18,2) NOT NULL,    paymentdate date,    paymentamount numeric(18,2) NOT NULL,    details text,    lastupdateuserid smallint,    lastupdatedatetime timestamp without time zone NOT NULL\n);\n
